alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 10:19PM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... Ouachita River At Felsenthal Lock and Dam affecting Union and Ashley Counties. For the Ouachita River...including Felsenthal Lock and Dam, Monroe, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ouachita River At Felsenthal Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 71.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 PM CST Wednesday was 71.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday morning and continue falling to 69.3 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 70.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 70.2 feet on 12/14/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 1030 PM CST.
